item.title: 华尔街日报》称 Binance 上月与财政部官员会面
item.description: 华尔街日报》援引熟悉会谈情况的未具名人士的话报道称，Binance 高管今年 3 月与财政部官员会面，讨论美国放松对其监管的问题。【原文：Binance executives met with officials from the Treasury Department in March to discuss a loosening of US oversight on it, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing unidentified people familiar with the talks.】

item.title: 泰尔支持的风险投资公司完成 46 亿美元的 Founders 基金 III
item.description: 根据美国证券交易委员会周五提交的一份文件，彼得-蒂尔支持的创始人基金（Founders Fund）已完成了一项46亿美元的后期风险投资基金。【原文：The Peter Thiel-backed Founders Fund has closed a $4.6 billion later-stage venture capital fund, according to a US Securities and Exchange Commission filing Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普提出 10%基准关税的可能例外情况
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他可以对大多数美国贸易伙伴征收的10%关税提供一些豁免；尽管他坚称，对于寻求谈判贸易协议的国家来说，这已经 "非常接近 "底线。【原文：President Donald Trump said he could offer some exemptions to his 10% tariff on most US trading partners — even as he insisted that it was “pretty close” to a floor for nations seeking to negotiate trade deals.】

item.title: BayPine 达成收购临床试验公司 CenExel 的协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，投资公司 BayPine 已同意以约 15 亿美元的价格收购 CenExel 临床研究公司。【原文：The investment firm BayPine has agreed to acquire CenExel Clinical Research for about $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, in a sign companies are still striking deals even as uncertainty roils financial markets.】

item.title: Netflix 测试新的人工智能搜索引擎以推荐节目和电影
item.description: Netflix 公司正在为用户测试新的搜索技术，该技术利用人工智能帮助用户查找电视节目和电影，扩大了该技术的使用范围。【原文：Netflix Inc. is testing new search technology for subscribers that employs artificial intelligence to help them find TV shows and movies, expanding its use of the technology.】

item.title: Golub 在市场动荡期间加速为新的 CLO 购买贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Golub Capital 本周迅速购买了大量杠杆贷款，以利用价格大幅下跌的机会。【原文：Golub Capital quickly bought a large amount of leveraged loans this week to take advantage of prices dropping significantly, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 前谷歌首席执行官称加拿大可满足人工智能竞赛的能源需求
item.description: 谷歌前首席执行官埃里克-施密特（Eric Schmidt）表示，如果加拿大能够在与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战中与美国合作，那么加拿大丰富的水电资源将为蓬勃发展的人工智能服务器提供最佳动力，并在全球人工智能竞赛中获胜。【原文：Canada’s abundant hydroelectricity offers the best way to power booming artificial intelligence servers and win the global AI race — if the country is able to cooperate with the US amid a trade war with President Donald Trump, according to former Google chief Eric Schmidt.】

item.title: Meta 将特朗普前顾问、Stripe 首席执行官纳入董事会
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.董事会增加了两名新成员：唐纳德-特朗普总统的重要前顾问迪娜-鲍威尔-麦考密克（Dina Powell McCormick）和金融技术公司 Stripe 的首席执行官帕特里克-科里森（Patrick Collison）。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has added two new people to its board of directors — Dina Powell McCormick, a key former adviser to President Donald Trump, and Patrick Collison, the chief executive officer of Stripe, a financial technology company.】

item.title: 匈牙利因欧尔班的开支计划被S&P评为 "不及格 "边缘
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）在大选前加大了开支，S&P 全球评级公司将匈牙利的主权信用等级展望从稳定下调至负面，将该国推向了垃圾级的边缘。【原文：Hungary’s sovereign credit grade outlook was lowered to negative from stable at S&P Global Ratings, pushing the nation to the edge of junk after Prime Minister Viktor Orban ramped up pre-election spending.】

item.title: 培根、鸡蛋和奶酪三明治告诉我们美国经济的哪些信息
item.description:
在今天的 "Big Take "播客中，我们将为您揭开您所不知道的经济指标：请看培根、鸡蛋和奶酪指数。【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast, we crack open the economic indicator you didn’t know you needed: Behold the bacon, egg and cheese index.

】

item.title: 惠誉将尼日利亚评级提升至 B 级，理由是该国致力于政策改革
item.description: 惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将尼日利亚的信用评级上调至 B 级，仍为投机级，理由是政策可信度提高，宏观经济稳定的近期风险降低。【原文：Nigeria’s credit rating was upgraded to B by Fitch Ratings, remaining in the speculative-grade category, citing improved policy credibility and reduced near-term risks to macroeconomic stability.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）协议在即，阿根廷将建立比索管理浮动机制
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）希望与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）达成一项 200 亿美元的计划，因此阿根廷取消了与货币挂钩的做法，为建立一个更加灵活的体系奠定了基础。【原文：Argentina eliminated a crawling peg on the currency and laid the groundwork for a more flexible system as President Javier Milei looks set to secure a $20 billion program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 意大利获得 S&P 信用评级升级，梅洛尼再获殊荣
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings —）上调了意大利的信用评级；这是信用评估机构第三次上调意大利的信用评级，预计该国的公共财政将得到改善。【原文：Italy’s credit rating was upgraded by S&P Global Ratings — the third such plaudit from credit assessors anticipating improvements in the country’s public finances.】

item.title: 黄金纠纷后马杜罗全面整顿委内瑞拉中央银行
item.description: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）在中央银行董事会抵制将未经认证的黄金纳入国家国际储备的计划后，对中央银行董事会进行了彻底改革。【原文：Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro overhauled the central bank’s board after it resisted a plan to include uncertified gold in the nation’s international reserves.】

item.title: 随着市场跌宕起伏，一种新的恐惧蔓延整个华尔街
item.description: 周三，当 "特朗普邮报"（真正的特朗普邮报，而不是骗局）发布后，S&P 500 指数在八分钟内暴涨 7% 时，艾德-胡赛尼离开了他在曼哈顿的办公桌。此时，算法已经接管了市场，所有市场的买单都在疯狂涌入，"根本无计可施"。【原文：When the Trump post hit — the real one, not the hoax — and the S&P 500 vaulted 7% in eight minutes Wednesday, Ed Al-Hussainy stepped away from his desk in Manhattan. The algos had taken over at that point, and the buy orders were pouring in at such a furious clip across all markets that “there was nothing to do.”】

item.title: Forever 21 破产债权人调查 Sparc 与 JCPenney 的并购案
item.description: Forever 21 Inc. 美国运营商的一个无担保债权人委员会表示，他们正在 "积极调查 "该零售商在申请破产保护前进行的所有交易，包括 JCPenney 收购运营商母公司 Sparc Group 的交易。【原文：A committee of unsecured creditors to Forever 21 Inc.’s US operator said they are “aggressively investigating” all deals made by the retailer before it filed for Chapter 11, including JCPenney’s acquisition of the operator’s parent Sparc Group.】

item.title: 艾斯勒在损失 3000 万美元后停止了皮亚夫斯基花苞的交易
item.description: Eisler Capital 的投资组合经理 Barry Piafsky 和他的团队在市场持续大跌期间损失了数百万美元，现已被停止交易。【原文：Eisler Capital’s portfolio manager Barry Piafsky and his team have been stopped out from trading after they lost millions of dollars during the ongoing market selloff.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，对冲基金以创纪录的速度逆转石油押注
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对主要贸易伙伴征收关税，威胁到全球能源需求，对冲基金以有史以来最快的速度扭转了对石油的立场。【原文：Hedge funds reversed their position on oil at the fastest pace on record as US President Donald Trump imposed tariffs against major trade partners, threatening to cripple global energy demand.】

item.title: 前 OpenAI 员工在阻止重组的法律斗争中支持马斯克
item.description: 十几名 OpenAI 的前员工反对这家初创公司改组为营利性公司的计划，支持埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对这一高风险改组提出的法律挑战。【原文：A dozen former OpenAI employees are objecting to the startup’s plan to restructure as a for-profit, siding with Elon Musk’s high-stakes legal challenge to the overhaul.】

item.title: 阿根廷中央银行抛售多达 4 亿美元以保护比索
item.description: 阿根廷当局在周五的一份声明中说，阿根廷中央银行周五抛售了 3.98 亿美元以捍卫比索，这是自 3 月中旬以来抛售比索最多的一天。【原文：Argentina’s Central Bank sold $398 million to defend the peso on Friday, the most in a day since mid-March, authorities said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 巴纳德大学、锡拉丘兹大学评级展望因债务负担沉重而被降级
item.description: 本周，巴纳德学院（Barnard College）和锡拉丘兹大学（Syracuse University）的债券评级展望转为负面，这表明两所学校都可能因债务负担而被降级。【原文：Barnard College and Syracuse University saw their bond-rating outlooks flipped to negative this week, signaling both schools could be downgraded because of their debt loads.】

item.title: 在国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成协议之前，阿根廷通胀率升幅超出预期
item.description: 阿根廷上个月的通货膨胀率创下了自 8 月份以来的最大涨幅，原因是在就国际货币基金组织的新融资方案进行预期投票之前，货币波动加剧。【原文：Argentina’s inflation last month jumped the most since August amid increased currency volatility in the run-up to an expected vote on a fresh financing package from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会禁止高管加入埃克森和雪佛龙董事会的禁令受到质疑
item.description: 拜登时代禁止两位著名石油高管在美国最大石油公司董事会任职的反垄断裁决正在受到挑战。【原文：Biden-era antitrust rulings that barred two prominent oil executives from serving on the boards of the biggest US oil companies are being challenged.】

item.title: MLIV Pulse 发现，关税暂停为时已晚，美国人正在出走
item.description: 根据最新的 MLIV Pulse 调查，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普暂停广泛征收关税，但投资者仍希望避开美国资产，转而投资欧洲和其他发达市场。【原文：Despite President Donald Trump’s pause on broad tariffs, investors are still looking to shun US assets in favor of Europe and other developed markets, according to the latest MLIV Pulse survey.】

item.title: 杰富瑞准备 6 亿美元出售德克萨斯州合成氨厂债务
item.description: Jefferies Financial Group Inc. 正准备在杠杆债务资本市场为特种化学品制造商 Gulf Coast Ammonia 筹集约 6 亿美元资金。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. is preparing to raise approximately $600 million in the leveraged debt capital markets for specialty chemicals manufacturer Gulf Coast Ammonia.】

item.title: 国债市场走势对通胀挂钩债券更为不利
item.description: 通胀挂钩债券是本月国债市场剧烈下跌的最大输家，而这只是通胀预期的部分原因。【原文：Inflation-linked bonds are the biggest losers in this month’s violent Treasury market selloff, and that’s only partly due to inflation expectations.】

item.title: 美国律师拒绝向法官透露被错误驱逐者的命运
item.description: 在最高法院下令美国协助一名被错误驱逐出境的马里兰州男子从萨尔瓦多臭名昭著的监狱返回美国的一天后，特朗普政府的一名律师在一次有争议的听证会上拒绝告诉法官政府正在采取什么措施来遣返这名男子。【原文：A Trump administration lawyer refused to tell a judge what the government is doing to bring back a wrongly deported Maryland man during a contentious hearing a day after the Supreme Court ordered the US to facilitate the man’s return from a notorious prison in El Salvador.】

item.title: 市场波动加剧，周五信贷交易更加繁忙
item.description: 对于美国企业债券交易员来说，金融市场的波动正在打破周五的平静。【原文：For US corporate bond traders, the volatility in financial markets is chipping away at their usual Friday lull.】

item.title: 美国页岩钻机闲置速度近两年最快
item.description: 由于日益加剧的国际贸易紧张局势有可能抑制能源需求，美国页岩地区的钻井数量出现了近两年来最快的下降。【原文：Drilling in the US shale patch declined at the fastest pace in almost two years as mounting international trade tensions threaten to stifle energy demand.】
